text: we the United States stand with you and
all the Ukrainian people under ukraine
united and i'll say at the top we do not
recognize we do not recognize Russia's
actions in the Crimea but today as I
said there are some trying to pull
Ukraine apart and you have we're in the
struggle for your very future there's
been a lot of talk about geopolitics
about east and west but here in Ukraine
people know that it's about something
much more fundamental it's not about
geopolitics is about unity it's about
independence and at its most basic level
it's about restoring respect and dignity
for months Ukrainians brave
bone-chilling cold weather and stood
down snipers bullets in the Madonna and
I know not every Ukrainian feels the
same way about the Madonna I understand
that but is my view that all Ukrainians
can agree on the core idea that
government exists to serve the people
the people do not exist to serve the
government the people of Ukraine of
Ukraine should have the right to choose
their own future
